WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.TITLE: WhatsApp Templates
WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.DESCRIPTION: Create and manage WhatsApp message templates for your business communications.
WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.EMPTY_DESCRIPTION: Create your first WhatsApp template to start sending messages to your customers.
WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.NAME: Template Name
WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.NAME_HELP: Use lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores only
WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.BODY_PLACEHOLDER: Enter your message template. Use variables like 1, 2, etc. in double curly braces.
WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.CREATE_AND_SUBMIT_SUCCESS: Template created and submitted for approval. You'll be notified when Meta reviews it.
WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.SUBMIT_FOR_APPROVAL_AFTER_CREATE: Submit for approval immediately after creating
WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.SUBMIT_FOR_APPROVAL_AFTER_CREATE_HELP: Sends the template to Meta for review so you can use it for messages as soon as it's approved.
WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.DELETE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete the template "{name}"?
WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.RESET_TO_DRAFT_SUCCESS: Template reset to draft. You can now edit it.
WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.RESET_TO_DRAFT_ERROR: Failed to reset template to draft
WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.IMPORT_ERROR: Failed to import templates from Meta
WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.DUPLICATE_PROMPT: Enter a name for the new template:
WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.DUPLICATE_SUCCESS: Template duplicated. You can now edit it.
WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.VALIDATION_ERROR: Please fix the errors before submitting
WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.SELECT_CHANNELS_HELP: Choose which WhatsApp Business accounts to submit this template to. Each account requires separate Meta approval.
WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.NO_CHANNELS_FOUND: No WhatsApp channels found. Please add a WhatsApp inbox first.
WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.SUBMIT_TO_MULTIPLE_CHANNELS_HELP: Template will be submitted for approval to {count} WhatsApp Business accounts.
WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.SUBMIT_TO_CHANNELS_SUCCESS: Template submitted to {count} channel(s) for approval
WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.SUBMIT_TO_CHANNELS_PARTIAL: Submitted to {success} channel(s), {failed} failed. Check template list for details.

MODAL.TITLE: Whatsapp Templates
MODAL.SUBTITLE: Select the whatsapp template you want to send

PICKER.NO_TEMPLATES_AVAILABLE: No WhatsApp templates available. Click refresh to sync templates from WhatsApp.
PICKER.REFRESH_SUCCESS: Templates refresh initiated. It may take a couple of minutes to update.
PICKER.REFRESH_ERROR: Failed to refresh templates. Please try again.

PARSER.FORM_ERROR_MESSAGE: Please fill all variables before sending
